title: Want to block riot's league of legends client from logging/spying on your PC?
body:
If you go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs or where ever you installed league of legends.
You can see what logs riot's league of legends game client logs/spy on you.
What if you do not want riot's league of legends game client to log/spy on you?
Well to fix this problem you want to go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends or where you installed it:
1. First right-click on Logs
2. Click on Properties
3. Click on the Security Tab
4. Click on Edit
Now you want to do the next step for all Group or Users:
5. Select each group or user and under Permissions for Authenticated Users
6. Tick the box under Deny for Full control
7. Once you have done that for all group or users click on OK
8. A message will come up and you click on Yes
9. You click on OK and you are now done.
No more Logs/spying.

If you want to undo this
Do step 1 to 3 and instead of clicking on Edit, you click on Advanced and select each group or user that their type is set to Deny and click on remove. Once you have removed all the denied group or users, you click on OK and OK again.
